name: Pedophobia
description:
You are trapt inside the headquarters of the Spooky Baby Cult. Your mission? Only to fight your way through the headquarters of the most spooky cult in THE WHOLE WORLD!
The cult has spread a spooky virus. Everyone you know is gone. Have all been turned into babies.
EVIL (SPOOKY GHOST) BABIES!
The time is running, your sanity is decreasing.
Will you survive? Will you escape? And will you still be yourself if you do?
